item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students still working on their 40 volunteer hours are encouraged to check the Teams for approved opportunities or speak with a Guidance Counsellor for help getting started.

item.title: A message from Mrs. Longval :
item.description: the Weight Room is open daily at lunch from 10:40â€“11:20. Thursdays are reserved for female students only. Plus, the weight room is also open Tuesday after school. Come Join Mrs. Longval for a strength, cardio or stretch session.

item.title: A message from Mrs. Longval:
item.description: Students in Grades 9-12 Interested in trying out for our Varsity Badminton team are asked to sign up outside Mr. Longval's office. There will be a short meeting for all interested on Wednesday, February 11th at 10:45am in the gymnasium. Please drop by Mrs. Longval's office if you have any questions.

item.title: A message from the main office:
item.description: If there are any students that have yet to hand in the parental consent vaccination form to the main office, please do so today, the clinic is on Wednesday.

item.title: A message from the Unity Club:
item.description: The Unity Club is excited to announce the upcoming Black HIstory Month Panel Called Elevate and Empower. Later this month, the panel will create a space to learn more about Black History, share their personal experiences and have meaningful conversations about Black identity and empowerment. More details will be shared soon. Stay tuned for more information. We look forward to seeing some of you there!

item.title: A message from Mme. Perron:
item.description: There will be a Europe Trip meeting on Thursday, Feburary 13th at 11:00 in Room 125. All travelers must atttend!
